homepage.about.title.description: Title for the About Me section

homepage.about.paragraph1.message: I'm a Computer Engineer based in Barcelona, graduated from the {uabLink} with a specialization in Computer Science.
homepage.about.paragraph1.description: First paragraph in the About section introducing the user

homepage.about.paragraph2.message: My expertise lies in full-stack development, with a strong focus on backend systems, particularly using PHP with Laravel. I have experience in API integrations, database management, infrastructure deployment, and scripting automation.

homepage.about.paragraph3.message: Over the years, I have been involved in projects related to VoIP solutions, including automating phone calls for various use cases, real-time call monitoring with Asterisk, and developing platforms for enterprise clients to manage their telecommunication services.

homepage.about.paragraph4.message: In addition to backend development, I have experience with frontend technologies, system administration, and scripting. I enjoy working in small, collaborative teams where I can contribute to the entire development cycle, from architecture design to deployment and maintenance.
homepage.about.paragraph4.description: Fourth paragraph about frontend, sysadmin, collaboration and team preferences

homepage.about.paragraph5.message: Outside of my professional work, I maintain a home lab environment where I develop projects like {eco2Link}, a website that helped my team win a Hackathon. I also enjoy working on personal projects involving C++ for microcontrollers and Python for rapid prototyping.
homepage.about.paragraph5.description: Fifth paragraph about personal projects and home lab

homepage.about.tabs.experienceLabel.description: Label for the Professional Experience tab

homepage.about.experience.cardTitle.description: Title for the Work Experience card

homepage.about.experience.nubelfon.heade.message: Nubelfon - Full Stack Developer & Solutions Developer
homepage.about.experience.nubelfon.heade.description: Header for Nubelfon experience (Company and Role)

homepage.about.experience.nubelfon.achie.message: Led and developed enterprise VoIP solutions for government and corporate clients
Migration from legacy codebase to Laravel framework
Implementation of REST APIs for third-party integrations
Database schema optimization for improved performance
Architected 2 major platform upgrades enhancing scalability and maintainability
Developed automation scripts reducing repetitive tasks through queue workers

homepage.about.experience.nubelfon.respo.message: System integration with Asterisk PBX and VTiger CRM
Database design and optimization for high-volume call data management
Implementation of security features including Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
Development of real-time monitoring dashboards and automated reporting systems
Creation of technical documentation and client onboarding materials
Implementation of unit testing for core platform functionalities

homepage.about.experience.project.automa.description: Title for the Automated Calling System project
Date for the Automated Calling System project

homepage.about.experience.project.automa.message: Completed and maintained legacy call automation project as primary developer
Implemented modular architecture for client-specific customizations
Integrated Asterisk PBX for call handling and monitoring
Developed administration interface for call scheduling and tracking

homepage.about.experience.project.govTel.description: Title for the Government Telecom Monitoring Platform project
Date for the Government Telecom Monitoring Platform project

homepage.about.experience.project.govTel.message: Developed web platform for real-time call agent monitoring
Created bash scripts for processing Asterisk call events
Implemented CSV/PDF report generation for daily operations
Built dashboard displaying real-time call metrics and statistics

homepage.about.experience.project.client.description: Title for the Client Services Portal project
Date for the Client Services Portal project

homepage.about.experience.project.client.message: Restructured database schema for improved scalability
Modernized core platform with role-based access control
Integrated VTiger CRM with internal systems through centralized data hub
Created internal automation tools reducing manual work

homepage.about.experience.bellvitge.item.message: Balanced full-time engineering studies with healthcare work

homepage.skills.phpLaravel.description.message: Developed and maintained core backend systems for VoIP platforms. Migrated legacy codebases to Laravel, created REST APIs for frontend/third-party integrations, and implemented queue workers for call processing tasks.

homepage.skills.mysqlDatabase.name.description: Name for the MySQL Database skill

homepage.skills.mysqlDatabase.descriptio.message: Designed relational database schemas for telecom systems, optimized query performance, and implemented complex reporting queries for call analytics.
homepage.skills.mysqlDatabase.descriptio.description: Description for the MySQL Database skill

homepage.skills.voiceApis.name.description: Name for the Voice APIs (Google/Amazon) skill

homepage.skills.voiceApis.description.message: Integrated speech-to-text and text-to-speech capabilities for interactive voice systems. Implemented natural language processing for phone calls navigation.
homepage.skills.voiceApis.description.description: Description for the Voice APIs (Google/Amazon) skill

homepage.skills.asteriskPbx.name.description: Name for the Asterisk PBX skill

homepage.skills.asteriskPbx.description.message: Configured applications interacting with Asterisk PBX. Developed call monitoring programs and reporting dashboards. Created custom call flows using LLMs for specific client requirements.
homepage.skills.asteriskPbx.description.description: Description for the Asterisk PBX skill

homepage.skills.restApi.name.description: Name for the REST API Development skill

homepage.skills.restApi.description.message: Built Laravel APIs to enable clients to interact with our services through their own portals/platforms. Developed documentation and integration examples for third-party developers.
homepage.skills.restApi.description.description: Description for the REST API Development skill

homepage.skills.htmlCss.description.message: Built responsive admin interfaces and client portals. Implemented complex layouts for real-time dashboards while maintaining cross-browser compatibility.

homepage.skills.javascriptJquery.descrip.message: Developed interactive UI components for call monitoring dashboards. Implemented real-time updates using AJAX and WebSockets.

homepage.skills.bootstrap.description.message: Created consistent UI designs across multiple admin panels and customer-facing interfaces. Served as the primary styling library for component cohesion throughout projects.

homepage.skills.laravelBlade.name.description: Name for the Laravel Blade skill

homepage.skills.laravelBlade.description.message: Developed dynamic server-rendered templates with reusable components for efficient frontend-backend integration.
homepage.skills.laravelBlade.description.description: Description for the Laravel Blade skill

homepage.skills.responsiveDesign.name.description: Name for the Responsive Design skill

homepage.skills.responsiveDesign.descrip.message: Implemented mobile-first approaches for all client-facing web applications.
homepage.skills.responsiveDesign.descrip.description: Description for the Responsive Design skill

homepage.skills.serverManagement.name.description: Name for the Web Server Management skill

homepage.skills.serverManagement.descrip.message: Managed production servers including performance monitoring, security hardening, and package management. Administered Proxmox-based servers both in cloud and local environments.
homepage.skills.serverManagement.descrip.description: Description for the Web Server Management skill

homepage.skills.bashScripting.descriptio.message: Developed deployment scripts and automation tools for server maintenance and log analysis.
homepage.skills.bashScripting.descriptio.description: Description for the Bash Scripting skill

homepage.skills.cppMicrocontrollers.desc.message: Used during university studies and as a hobbyist. Develop programs for microcontrollers using platforms like Arduino, PlatformIO, and ESP-IDF for personal electronics projects.

homepage.skills.pythonPrototyping.descri.message: Created custom applications for clients and rapid proof-of-concept development. Used for scripting, automation, and quick implementation of ideas.
